skills.name: Ram
skills.desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Timed Module
skills.desc: The next action uses Self-Exploding Module.

skills.name: Self-Exploding Module
skills.desc: Self-destructs, dealing Fire DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Chains of Destruction
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG to adjacent units when suffering a killing blow.
